dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 4998 IH: Preserving Safety Net Integrity Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Good of Virginia (for himself, Mr. Babin, Mr. Grothman, Mr. Norman, Mr. Tiffany, Mr. LaMalfa, Mr. Gosar, Mr. DesJarlais, Mr. Mills, Mr. Ezell, Mr. Weber of Texas, Mrs. Miller of Illinois, and Mr. Ogles) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To provide that the final rule of the Department of Homeland Security entitled Inadmissibility on Public Charge Grounds shall have the full force and effect of law, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Preserving Safety Net Integrity Act of 2023.

subsection.text: The final rule of the Department of Homeland Security entitled Inadmissibility on Public Charge Grounds (85 Fed. Reg. 41292, August 14, 2019) shall have the full force and effect of law.
The final rule of the Department of Homeland Security entitled Public Charge Ground of Inadmissibility (87 Fed. Reg. 55472, September 9, 2022) shall have no force or effect.
